name: Heartbreaker
description:
A split screen game that pits the hero against the monster. Don't let the hero kill you and rescue his lover and don't let the monster ruin your only chance of getting your life back.

Controls
TWO CONTROLLERS ARE REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME
Dungeon Master
Left stick: Move
Right Stick: Rotate Camera
Right Bumper and Left Bumper: Change items
A: Place object
D-Pad: Select objects

The Hero
Left Stick: Move
Right Stick: Rotate Camera
A: Jump
D-Pad: Activate abilities
Right Trigger: Swing sword/interact with objects


Assets used:

  • Sounds from Soundly
  • Fonts from https://www.dafont.com/kaiser-zhar-khan.d2400 and https://www.dafont.com/brittney-murphy.d242
  • Crystal Heart image from https://scp-containment-is-magic.fandom.com/wiki/SCP-054

All other assets were made during the game jam.
